resources.string:
1. Use any username for signup process in main page 
2. Enter any statement you can remember or select from any predefined statements 
3. Select password type in next activity (from synonyms, antonyms or similar words) 
4. Select password words for each word in statement from the checklist or add your own custom word by using + button on lower side of the screen 
5. Hit next to go to next word and repeat for all the words asked. 
6. Select correct words from the word cloud to confirm your password. 
7. Enter your username to login 
8. Select from the word cloud your password.
